import logging
import os
import sys

def log_aggregation(log_file_path, log_level='INFO', log_format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'):
    logging.basicConfig(filename=log_file_path, level=log_level, format=log_format, datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
    root_logger = logging.getLogger()
    stdout_handler = logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)
    stdout_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(log_format))
    root_logger.addHandler(stdout_handler)
